text: the climate crisis is the most serious
challenge human civilization has ever
faced we're going to decarbonize the
economy go with solar and wind batteries
and efficiency each country is coming up
with its own goals and surprisingly
they're getting pretty ambitious sum
total of all the commitments so will
probably fall short of what the world
really needs but it's going to send a
very powerful signal to business and
industry and to all of us that we're
only changing in one direction I'm very
optimistic that we're going to have a
big success the climate reality project
is hosting a 24-hour live broadcast and
webcast November 13 and 14 from the
Eiffel Tower in Paris we'll have a lot
of great music acts and we'll have world
leaders who will be there in live
interviews and we'll have original
videos and films the purpose is to build
momentum for a successful outcome in the
Paris negotiations to solve the climate
crisis
